30e5de80-2a8d-4ca1-9bc4-c2011749f775.description: The CSMPA offers participants a holistic view of the cybersecurity of an automotive company are important. The program consists of 7 modules that give participants introductions to information & know-how protection, information security and legal requirements, IT & cyber security and security culture, as well the requirements for a cyber security management system (CSMS), according to UN R155.

badge_template_activities.title: The CSMPA program aims to link theoretically learned content with practical implementation in everyday work. This provides for a group size of eight participants per training program, who in turn are divided into four tandems. The tandems are preferably divided up across locations and departments in order to strengthen cooperation within the Group on various safety issues. The CSMPA program includes 7 modules to study and lasts 8 months. Each module ends with a final presentation.
